name: jsdoc-typescript-plugin
description: A JSDoc plugin to generate a TypeScript definition file (.d.ts) from annotated JSDoc sources

scripts.test:cesium: npm run cesium-doc && tsc ./typings/cesium.d.ts && tsc test/cesium-tests.ts
scripts.test:ol: npm run ol-doc && tsc ./typings/openlayers.d.ts && tsc test/openlayers-tests.ts
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:misc && npm run test:ol && npm run test:cesium

author: Jackie Ng
